statements.query: MATCH (n:HexnodeUser) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:HexnodeDevice) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:HexnodeDeviceGroup) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:HexnodePolicy) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:Human) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:HexnodeUser)-[r:OWNS_DEVICE]->(:HexnodeDevice) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:HexnodeDevice)-[r:MEMBER_OF]->(:HexnodeDeviceGroup) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:HexnodeDeviceGroup)-[r:APPLIES_POLICY]->(:HexnodePolicy) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:Human)-[r:IDENTITY_HEXNODE]->(:HiBobDepartment) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
